attributes.action: Stop Westergate School discriminating againgst girls school trousers.
attributes.additional_details: The teachers at Westergate School are putting uniform before education by prejudicing against school trousers that conform with their uniform policy. They are discriminating against girls especially by saying their trousers are skin tight when they are bootleg. This is unacceptable. Pupils feel humiliated and bullied by aggresive staff. Please sign if you agree that this is wrong.
